description: Try our easy to follow Fresh Fig & Apricot Free-Form Tart recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Fresh Fig & Apricot Free-Form Tart Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Transfer tart on paper to hot tray. Bake for 35 minutes or until pastry is golden. Serve with cream.
